attributes.action: Keep gyms open (for mental and physical health)
attributes.additional_details: Keep them open. Benefits far outweigh the risks.
attributes.background:
We want gyms to remain open. 
They aid mental and physical well-being of huge numbers of people across the UK. 
It is unacceptable for them to close.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869
